location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 15 June and requesting Bruce to call upon the Marine Agent in the Persian Gulf to transmit a statement of his services for the time he was in charge.
